title: Scratch
description: When a down on his luck horror novelist from Lexington North Carolina decides to get a fresh start in rural Florida what follows is a grizzly tale of both redemption and revenge. During his travels into the swamps and marshes of the Sunshine State, he meets the local population of townsfolk, goat farmers, law enforcement, drug dealers, strippers, and unfortunately for him, the local legend. This is a slow burn story with an explosive conclusion. Keep the lights on for this one.
author: Thomas W.  Brown
